title: Start or Sit (NFC); Thanksgiving Recaps; Ravens-Steelers Update (11/27 Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Hope your Thanksgiving was awesome, now let's talk football! What should Fantasy managers and commissioners do about this Ravens-Steelers situation (2:30)? Will there be a Week 18 in the NFL season? And let's recap Texans-Lions (10:30) and Washington-Cowboys (12:50) ... News and notes (15:35), stud RBs with tough matchups (20:10) like Raheem Mostert and CEH, "Beat the Waiver Wire" (24:00) and the Startometer (26:00) for SF-LAR, CHI-GB and SEA-PHI ... Start or Sit for Chiefs-Bucs (31:55), Panthers-Vikings (40:31), Raiders-Falcons (47:03), 49ers-Rams (55:40), Bears-Packers (58:10), Seahawks-Eagles (1:01:30) ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
Listen to the brand new Fantasy Football Today in 5 podcast: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/fantasy-football-today-in-5/id1528634304
'Fantasy Football Today' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox, and wherever else you listen to podcasts.
Follow the new FFT Twitch channel: https://www.twitch.tv/FFToday
Follow our FFT team on Twitter: @FFToday, @AdamAizer, @JameyEisenberg, @daverichard, @heathcummingssr, @BenSchragg
Watch FFT on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCviK78rIWXhZdFzJ1Woi7Fg/videos
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/FantasyFootballToday/
Sign up for the FFT newsletter https://www.cbssports.com/newsletter
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:title: Start or Sit (NFC); Thanksgiving Recaps; Ravens-Steelers Update (11/27 Fantasy Football Podcast)
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: Do we trust Raheem Mostert or CEH in tough matchups? What about Chris Carson? We also discuss the TB and CAR WRs, Nelson Agholor's appeal and what commissioners should do about the BAL-PIT game
